sentences.en: Adipose tissue as seen in a regular histological section.
sentences.cn: 组织切片可见脂肪组织.

sentences.en: After I become pouch operation adipose meeting second birth?
sentences.cn: 我做眼袋手术后脂肪会再生 吗 ?

sentences.en: By contrast, brown adipose tissue consumes energy to generate body heat.
sentences.cn: 正好相反, 棕色脂肪组织通过消耗能量而产生体热.

sentences.en: Fats and carbohydrates are stored as the adipose tissues of the body.
sentences.cn: 脂肪和糖以人体脂肪组织的形式存储下来.

sentences.en: Genic transcriptome pertinent to porcine muscle and adipose also came into study.
sentences.cn: 猪肌肉和脂肪相关基因转录谱的研究亦初步展开.

sentences.en: GLUT 4 is the major glucose transporter of muscle and adipose tissue.
sentences.cn: 葡萄糖转运蛋白4是肌肉和脂肪组织中主要的葡萄糖转运子.

sentences.en: Inflammatory cell infiltration can be spread to the subcutaneous adipose tissue.
sentences.cn: 炎细胞浸润可波及到皮下脂肪组织.

sentences.en: Klauer said small animals and babies have brown adipose tissue, but as people get older, they tend to lose it.
sentences.cn: 克劳尔说幼小的动物和婴儿都有褐色脂肪组织，但是当人长大后，常常会失掉它。

sentences.en: Objective To review research progress of adipose tissue derived stromal cells ( ADSCs ).
sentences.cn: 目的介绍近期国内外脂肪组织来源的基质细胞研究进展.

sentences.en: Of excessive adipose or carbohydrate food can bring about fatty liver.
sentences.cn: 过量的脂肪或糖类食物可导致脂肪肝.

sentences.en: PM 2.5 exaggerates diet - induced insulin resistance, adipose inflammation, and visceral adiposity.
sentences.cn: 细微大气颗粒物PM2.5)能增加饮食引起的胰岛素抵抗 、 脂肪炎症反应 、 内脏肥胖.

sentences.en: The authors found that brown adipose tissue, a kind of fat, plays a very significant role in burning energy when exposed to cold.
sentences.cn: 他们发现的是一种脂肪，名为褐色脂肪组织，在身体遇到寒冷时燃烧能量方面发挥了非常显著的作用。

sentences.en: The color of unilocular adipose tissue varies from white to dark yellow.
sentences.cn: 单房性脂肪组织的颜色从白色到暗黄色不等.

sentences.en: The fatty acids cross the following layers in passing from the endothelium into the adipose cell.
sentences.cn: 脂肪酸从通过血管内皮到进入脂肪细胞要通过以下几层.

sentences.en: The hilum at the mid left contains some adipose tissue.
sentences.cn: 位于左侧中部的肾门处有一些脂肪组织.

sentences.en: The kidneys of mammal are encapsulated with adipose capsule.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物的肾脏被较厚的脂肪囊包被.

sentences.en: White fat is partitioned by septa of loose connective tissue into clusters of adipose cells.
sentences.cn: 白色脂肪被疏松结缔组织隔膜分隔成脂肪细胞群.

words.tran_cn: 肥胖，肥胖症；脂肪过多；肥胖倾向

trans.tran_cn: 含动物脂肪的，动物脂肪（似）的，脂肪质的，脂肪多的
trans.tran_en: of, resembling, or containing fat; fatty
